object.title: The flash bag
Description: Microwave Safe, Fine Printing, Non Toxic, Environment friendly: Gifts For All Fine Print Designed high quality mug which is made Made up of High quality
Amazing high quality ceramic Mugs from Arkist are now available at your doorstep. Enjoy your sip of tea or coffee or any of your favorite beverge or drinks in these attarctive designed ceramic mugs.

The capacity of these mugs is 340 ml. Each comes in seperate box packing. Ideal for gifting to your near and dear ones. Best option for corporate gifting as well. Some colors may be slightly differ from the image shown due to sublimation.
Use it at your home or office, even your kids will love those.Ceramic Mug, this mug is microwave and dishwasher safe at an affordable price.
